attributes.action: Stop all gambling adverts on television and radio
attributes.additional_details: The television is saturated with gambling adverts, this has got to stop before it ruins our society. Research has shown that children as young as 11 years old are now gambling and getting into debt.People are getting into debt because they are addicted to gambling, they have no chance of stopping or breaking their addiction while they are bombarded by gambling adverts everywhere.
attributes.background: I want the government to take responsibility for the increase in the numbers of people gambling., and stop all gambling adverts
